decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing Lotus Field to generate a large amount of mana and cast powerful spells quickly. It includes cards like Archdruid's Charm, Hidden Strings, and Emergent Ultimatum to set up game-winning combos. Additionally, cards like Boseiju, Who Endures and Strict Proctor help protect key pieces of the combo from disruption. The goal is to ramp up quickly and overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and strong board presence. Lot of the deck is built around creating a strong mana base and untapping Lotus Field to produce even more mana for explosive plays.
